A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, what a dumpster fire. This is the worst Star Wars since Attack of the Clones. There are so many just dumb decisions in this movie. Dumb lines\, dumb plot holes\, dumb wastes of good characters and unnecessary insertions of others. I would have been laughing at how bad this movie was if it had't been crushing my hopes and dreams for the franchise. Someone please fire Rian Johnson from the new trilogy immediately.
